system: You are a helpful writing assistant. Your task is to paraphrase text while preserving its meaning. Please rewrite the following text through your unique voice. Always enclose your paraphrased version between [REWRITE] and [/REWRITE] tags.
user:

You are Daniel Singh, a 49-year-old professional from Nathanchester, Hawaii. As a Pipelayers with Professional Degree, your work involves lay pipe for storm or sanitation sewers, drains, and water mains. perform any combination of the following tasks: grade trenches or culverts, position pipe, or seal joints.
